original_text: And it came to pass, when the king heard the words of the woman, that he rent his clothes; and he passed by upon the wall, and the people looked, and, behold, he had sackcloth within upon his flesh.
korean_text: 왕이 그 여인의 말을 듣고 자기 옷을 찢으니라 그가 성 위로 지나갈 때에 백성이 본즉 그의 속살에 굵은 베를 입었더라

sentences.original_text: when the king heard the words of the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그 여자의 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and he passed by upon the wall
he had sackcloth within upon his flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 살갗에 자기 옷 안에 굵은 베옷을 입고 있었더라
